newsitem.title: USA: Imnet Systems Inc Q2 oper profit rises.
newsitem.headline: Imnet Systems Inc Q2 oper profit rises.

text.p: Three Months Ended Six Months Ended

On September 30, 1996, the company issued 429,292 shares of its common stock for all of the outstanding common stock of Hunter International Inc. The merger has been accounted for as a pooling of interests, resulting in the restatement of prior earnings.
(a) 1996 six month period excludes a non-recurring charge of $750,000 ($0.08 per share) related to acquisition costs associated with the Hunter International Inc.

(b) 1995 Q2 and six month periods exclude a non-recurring charge of $5,740,000 ($0.66 per share and $0.70 per share for the three and six month periods ended Dec. 31, 1996, respectively) related to in-process research and development expenses associated with the company's acquisition of Evergreen Technologies Inc and Quesix Software Inc completed during the second quarter of fiscal 1996 ended Dec. 31, 1995.
